We have updated the Card security limits management menu. Now you can easily control your spending and set limits for certain transaction types (POS/ATM/E-commerce).
The other updates regard to the bank products’ order process. Any bank product could be ordered by just one click.
For better performance we have also fixed some minor bugs.

The other updates regard to the bank products’ order process. Any bank product could be ordered by just one click.
For better performance we have also fixed some minor bugs.

We have updated SMS Banking service functionality. With new release you can easily manage the service, connect new numbers, delete old ones.
We also finalized the menu of a geolocation of our ATM and Branches.
By means of the updated service you will be able to search for ATMs upon existence currency (AZN/USD/EUR) as well as currently serving branches.

We have added the parking servises in Payments section. You just need to scan the barcode on the check, and pay with any card available in the application.

We added new options in Offers menu. Now our clients can get a personalized loan offers from the Bank.
New ATM QR withdrawal function has been developed. BirBank users can withdraw money from ATM by using their smartphones. Card’s physical presence is not needed anymore.
Minor bugs were successfully fixed.

We added new options in Offers menu. Now our clients can get a personalized loan offers from the Bank.

Minor bugs were successfully fixed.

- We have created a new function for you - Account Change. From now on, all debit card holders of Kapital Bank will be able to link/unlink their card accounts. In other words, you can have only one plastic card in your wallet, through which you can use different accounts. For this, you need to go to the Cards menu -> More-> Change Account.
- Minor bug fixes.

- We have created a new function for you - Account Change. From now on, all debit card holders of Kapital Bank will be able to link/unlink their card accounts. In other words, you can have only one plastic card in your wallet, through which you can use different accounts. For this, you need to go to the Cards menu -> More-> Change Account.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Great news for BirKart users! In the new release we have added a personal cabinet for you - now can get detailed information about your debts. The functionality will allow you to track debts by categories (grace, non-grace, taksit), as well as to choose the sequence of repayments.
- Minor bug fixes

The greatest release of the year!
In this release we added new innovative options - PrePaid Card, SMS Radar.
- PrePaid card is a universal payment tool giving you opportunity to make online payments in case if you do not have a Kapital Bank payment card. To order PrePaid card, you need to go to the Cards menu and click "+". The application immediately generates a card connected to the 3D Secure service. The card is provided free of charge. The balance of the new card can be replenished in Kapital Bank cash-in ATMs or by transferring funds from other cards. Replenishment is also free!
- SMS Radar is a personal cabinet for drivers in BirBank. By using this service you will be able to check and pay fines online without leaving application. The service will also notify you about fines on your car. To use this functionality, go to the main menu line "Others" > > SMS Radar and add a car number or driver 's license.

- We optimized the logics of autotransfers. Now when you create a template, it will be enough to pass the 3DS test once, and the autoransfer will be activated.
- From now on, you will be able to see the balance of the attached cards of Kapital Bank and Pasha Bank. To use this, the attached cards must support 3DS.

Great news for Umico Loyalty Program users! From now on you can follow Umico bonuses in our application! For this you need to go to the  «Bonuses» menu, choose Umico and attach your bonus card. Here you can find barcode of your Umico card, by which you can award bonuses and make payments. Buy from Umico partners and earn more bonuses!

In this release, we have finalized the "Debt Notification" functionality. By saving your payments in "Favorites" menu, you will begin to receive notifications about subscription debt, with the opportunity of instant payment.
Pay through BirBank, earn more bonus points!

Great news for users of Birbank and portal Edvgerial.az!
In the new release you will be able to control your VAT savings in the personal cabinet "ƏDV geri al" in the menu "Bonuses". Here, for your convenience, we have created the ability to manage accumulated funds. You can make payments through your personal cabinet by choosing "Pay" or through the "Payments" menu, choosing the bonus option.

*Great news for users of EDVgerial.az! We have developed the transfer function. From now on, you will be able to transfer your VAT bonuses to all banks cards of the country.
*In this release we have improved the user experience and functionality of the "Transfers" menu. Now it is much more convenient to create templates, and it is also possible to track the status of translations to friends and requests from friends.
*In addition we optimized display of detailed information about Digital Card (PAN/CVV/expiry date).
*Minor bug fixes

• We added «Story» to the home page. Now you will be able to follow updates and campaigns in the application. In the “Story”, by using the «Swipe-up» action, you will be redirected to the corresponding section within BirBank or advertising posts on social networks for detailed information.
• Minor bug fixes.

• The functionality you've been waiting for! We have added a new reservation feature. You can reserve a queue in advance without wasting time for waiting. Select "Banking services" - "Online queue" section from main menu for reservation.
• We have improved user experience of “Cash by Code” menu and withdrawal them through an ATM without the need to have a bank card. Also we have optimized "Transfers to friend" menu.
• Minor bug fixes

• A great opportunity for holders of salary and pension cards from Kapital Bank! Now you can apply for loan products without visiting a branch. To use the service, you need to select any loan product in the "Banking Products" section and enter the relevant information. Consumer Loans received through BirBank application is transferred to a salary or pension card account.
• Minor bug fixes.

• Super opportunity for clients from «Kapital Bank». We have added the «Chat» function to BirBank. Now you can apply us directly from the application. In order to use the service, select the «Chat» button in the «Bank connection» section of the menu.
• Minor bug fixes.

• Great news for VAT users! Now you can add a check immediately, without waiting 90 minutes from the receipt of the check.
• You can increase the BirKart credit line limit directly through BirBank.
• Introduced the possibility of receiving funds sent through the "Zolotaya Korona" system to a bank card.
• After completing the transaction in the branch, you will get push notification through BirBank. Here you can rate the service level and leave your recommendations.
• Minor bug fixes.

• You can order a Digital card Visa/MasterCard type at the same time in all 3 currencies;
• By scanning the «VAT» receipt, you can go to the «Bonuses» with one click;
• Loan payment history tracking;
• Advance installment payment option by selecting several months;
• Introduced the possibility of sending funds from a bank card through «Xazri»;
• The possibility of adding card photo from gallery for card to card transfers;
• Transfer details are shown on the receipt page;
• Minor bug fixes;
